name: 3D Taxi City Parking - Crazy Cab Traffic Driving Simulator Extreme: Free Car Racing Game
name_original: 3D Taxi City Parking - Crazy Cab Traffic Driving Simulator Extreme: Free Car Racing Game
description:
[IMPORTANT: Due to high quality 3D graphics, this game may not work on older devices] Taxi Cab drivers unite! Take on a seriously difficult racing challenge. Navigate and steer your Taxi through the city streets. Pick up and drop off passengers for money. Get through the level and park at the parking spot at the end. Use money to upgrade your ride for better performance. 5 crazy Taxis to choose from. If you beat all the levels it unlocks 2 sandbox levels for unlimited free play.

Features:
• Huge City in day or night conditions
• 12 challenging levels
• 5 Crazy Cars
• Upgrade system, pimp your taxi!
• Fresh dubstep music tracks.
• Video replay – Share your experience with your friends


Compatiblity Information: Due to high quality 3D graphics and level size, this game requires 1024 mb of ram and may not run on older devices. Recommended iPad 3 and up, iPad Mini 2 and up and iPhone 5 and up.
